name: fa-diagrams
description: SVG diagrams built from Font-Awesome icons

scripts.prepublishOnly: browserify --require ./resources.json:../resources.json -o dist/fa-diagrams-data.js && browserify --exclude ../resources.json src/index.js -o dist/fa-diagrams.js && uglifyjs -m -c -o dist/fa-diagrams.min.js -- dist/fa-diagrams.js && uglifyjs -m -c -o dist/fa-diagrams-data.min.js -- dist/fa-diagrams-data.js

author: Klemek
